experiences: Used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to develop a foundational timesheet management module for the Wouessi Digital Employee Management System (EMS), implementing key features like client-side form validation and an automated total hour calculation to streamline data entry and reporting.

Contributed to the EMS project by meticulously following a structured development workflow, which included creating ClickUp tickets, managing Git feature branches, and actively participating in code reviews and testing, ensuring the work was clean, well-documented, and seamlessly integrated into the application.

Collaborated effectively with a remote development team through synchronous online meetings, using a structured workflow to create detailed tickets, manage feature branches, and to ensure all contributions to the Employee Management System were seamlessly integrated and of high quality.
